amendment.description: Amendment requires covered organizations to report required disclosures to shareholders, members or donors in a "clear and conspicuous manner.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-514 to require covered organizations to report required disclosures to shareholders, members or donors in a "clear and conspicuous manner.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ackerman amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ackerman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ackerman amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
